title: Mrudhu Bhave Dhruda Kruthye
overview: Shankar Das, with the help of his friends, escapes from his hometown in Kerala to Mumbai seeking refuge from false persecution in a criminal case. After 16 yrs, he returns to solve a drinking water issue and some mysteries of his past.
description: Shankar Das, with the help of his friends, escapes from his hometown in Kerala to Mumbai seeking refuge from false persecution in a criminal case. After 16 yrs, he returns to solve a drinking water issue and some mysteries of his past.

title: Uppu Puli Karam
overview: A beautiful story woven around the happenings of a elderly beautiful couple and their four children in their family.
description: A beautiful story woven around the happenings of a elderly beautiful couple and their four children in their family.

title: Winter Spring Summer or Fall
overview: Remi and Barnes, two very different teenagers, meet by chance in the winter of their senior year, then spend four days together over the course of a year that will change their lives forever.
description: Remi and Barnes, two very different teenagers, meet by chance in the winter of their senior year, then spend four days together over the course of a year that will change their lives forever.

title: A Cinderella Christmas Ball
overview: Follows Chelsea Jones, a dance instructor, as she travels to the small European country of Havenshire in search of her heritage during the Christmas break.
description: Follows Chelsea Jones, a dance instructor, as she travels to the small European country of Havenshire in search of her heritage during the Christmas break.

title: Antharam
overview: The inner conflicts, warmth, trauma and joyous moments in the lives of a transwoman, a teenage girl and a man living under the same roof.
description: The inner conflicts, warmth, trauma and joyous moments in the lives of a transwoman, a teenage girl and a man living under the same roof.

title: Christmas Under the Northern Lights
overview: An author visiting a small town over Christmas is shown the area's stunning vistas and Northern Lights by a handsome local guide.
description: An author visiting a small town over Christmas is shown the area's stunning vistas and Northern Lights by a handsome local guide.

title: Dark Nuns
overview: A young boy Hee-Joon is possessed by an evil spirit. Nun Yunia tries to save him, assisted by Nun Mikaela. Priest Paul attempts medical treatment, while Priest Andrew performs an exorcism to rid Hee-Joon of the spirit.
description: A young boy Hee-Joon is possessed by an evil spirit. Nun Yunia tries to save him, assisted by Nun Mikaela. Priest Paul attempts medical treatment, while Priest Andrew performs an exorcism to rid Hee-Joon of the spirit.

title: Everyone Loves Me
overview: A young woman reveals her crush on a classmate - only to be rejected. But love may still find a way when her gaming skills capture his attention.
description: A young woman reveals her crush on a classmate - only to be rejected. But love may still find a way when her gaming skills capture his attention.

title: K-Ramp
overview: Rich businessman Krishna sends his wayward son Kumar to Kerala for reform. There, Kumar falls for Mercy, a girl with PTSD and suicidal tendencies. Their love story faces challenges when Kumar decides to end things.
description: Rich businessman Krishna sends his wayward son Kumar to Kerala for reform. There, Kumar falls for Mercy, a girl with PTSD and suicidal tendencies. Their love story faces challenges when Kumar decides to end things.

title: Operation Mistletoe
overview: Interior designer Grace dates Quinn but is too busy for a real relationship. She has the opportunity to reunite with former boyfriend Ryan, a successful New York City financial advisor, when he returns to town at Christmas to sell the house where his grandmother lived. A popular charity event will be revived if Grace can convince Ryan to help.
description: Interior designer Grace dates Quinn but is too busy for a real relationship. She has the opportunity to reunite with former boyfriend Ryan, a successful New York City financial advisor, when he returns to town at Christmas to sell the house where his grandmother lived. title: Renovation Romance
overview: When Chelsea is forced to go to New Hampshire, she finds herself in a precarious situation with her career and relationship.
description: When Chelsea is forced to go to New Hampshire, she finds herself in a precarious situation with her career and relationship.

title: A Quiet Place: Day One
overview: A young woman named Sam finds herself trapped in New York City during the early stages of an invasion by alien creatures with ultra-sensitive hearing.
description: A young woman named Sam finds herself trapped in New York City during the early stages of an invasion by alien creatures with ultra-sensitive hearing.

title: A Very Jonas Christmas Movie
description: Three famous brothers race against time and face mounting challenges during a chaotic journey from London to New York, desperate to make it home in time for Christmas with their loved ones.

title: Avihitham
overview: In a village full of men and gossip about affairs, the narrative reveals how society absurdly judges and monitors women's identities.

title: Carol Doda Topless at the Condor
overview: A documentary set in San Francisco in 1964 when Carol Doda became the first dancer to go topless and in the process, became a tourist attraction second only to the Golden Gate Bridge.
description: A documentary set in San Francisco in 1964 when Carol Doda became the first dancer to go topless and in the process, became a tourist attraction second only to the Golden Gate Bridge.

title: Coupling

title: Dude
overview: Childhood friends Agan and Kural are inseparable. When Kural encounters romantic troubles, Agan must balance his hidden feelings for her with his desire to ensure her happiness.

title: Fragments for Venus

overview: Derren Brown successfully predicts the winning lottery numbers.

title: In Your Dreams
